title: Keyword Research - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description: Your all-in-one suite of SEO essentials.
content: By: Jo Cameron March 8, 2023 Diving for Pearls: A Guide to Long Tail Keywords - Next Level Keyword Research | Moz Tools Welcome to this refreshed installment of our educational Next Level series! Originally published in June 2016 this blog has been rewritten to include new tool screenshots and refreshed workflows. Together we’ll uncover keywords in the vastness of the long tail. Read this post By: Emilie Martin January 23, 2023 Daily SEO Fix: Investigating Keyword Cannibalization On-page SEO | Moz Tools | Keyword Research In this Daily SEO Fix edition, we take you through what keyword cannibalization is, how to investigate it on your own website, and how to solve any potential issues your site may have. Read this post By: Emilie Martin November 1, 2022 Announcing the Keyword Research Certification: Create a Personalized Keyword Strategy Keyword Research | Moz News Focusing on your audience and using keyword data to your advantage will make for much more successful campaigns than if you were to focus on the typical desirable keywords. With that, we are so excited to announce the launch of our brand-new Keyword Research Certification from Moz Academy. Read this post By: Tom Capper October 28, 2022 Metrics for Better Keyword Research — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | SEO Analytics | Keyword Research In today’s Whiteboard Friday, Tom explains some of the common mistakes SEOs make when doing keyword research that are easy to fix, many of which come from metrics like search volume, click-through rate, and difficulty. Read this post By: Claire Brain October 12, 2022 How to Apply Semantic SEO to Different Niches On-page SEO | Keyword Research A semantic SEO strategy can help you to carve out a competitive advantage in SEO’s ever-changing landscape. Once you understand the principles, you can apply semantic SEO writing to any niche. In this post, Claire outlines some of the successful strategies she and her team at Boom have used across different types of sites, along with some insights into the results they have achieved. Read this post By: Robin Lord October 7, 2022 Estimating Search Opportunity — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | SEO Analytics | Keyword Research Estimating the opportunities within your various SEO efforts is an important component of your analytics, not only to help determine where to focus your energy, but also to prove the potential value of your work to others. In today’s episode, Robin walks you through a good strategy for this all-important estimative work. Read this post By: Dave Westby October 3, 2022 Uncover Your Most Valuable Keywords with Aira’s New Keyword Opportunity Estimation Sheet Keyword Research | SEO Analytics When you have a list of keywords, it’s often tricky to know where you could potentially rank, what levels of traffic you can earn, and how this relates to conversions and revenue. To help, Dave walks you through Aira’s new Keyword Opportunity Estimation Google Sheet, which tries to answer these questions. Read this post By: Tom Capper September 5, 2022 How to Do Better, Lazier Keyword Research Keyword Research | Competitive Research In this post, Tom expands on one of the points from his recent MozCon talk: that a lot of time spent on keyword research is wasted. He’ll go over the three main ways SEOs turn what should be an involved piece of strategic thinking into an overly time-consuming routine, along with what to focus on instead. Read this post By: Dominick Sorrentino August 30, 2022 Why It's Getting Harder to Rank for Some Commercial Keywords (+ What You Can Do About It) Search Engines | Keyword Research When the team at Brafton discovered they were being unseated in the SERPs for some commercial keywords by directories, they dug into the data to find out why and how it was happening. Read this post By: Daniel Wood July 20, 2022 How We Increased Organic Traffic by 65% Using Keyword Research Working Sessions Keyword Research | SEO Consulting In this blog, Dan shows you why you should do a keyword research working session with your clients to tap into their expert industry knowledge, and how these sessions helped his team deliver organic traffic growth for one of their new clients with low Domain Authority. Read this post By: Adriana Stein July 19, 2022 How to Use Keywords to Combine the Power of SEO and Google Ads [Case Study] Keyword Research | Paid Search Marketing (PPC) Both SEO and PPC are used for a common goal — search engine marketing — and neither would survive without targeted keywords. Since both strategies have user intent and search demand in mind, you can use them to achieve both short-term and long-term business goals. When approached correctly, using SEO and PPC together can unlock significant opportunities for your brand, so let’s dig in! Read this post By: Ann Smarty June 22, 2022 Google Autocomplete: More than a Free Keyword Research Tool Search Engines | SEO Tools | Keyword Research For years, SEOs have been using Google Autocomplete (aka Google Suggest) as a free keyword research tool. Yet there’s much more to this search feature, especially after all the updates Google has introduced, turning Google Autocomplete into a smart and predictive platform of its own. Read this post By: Dr. Peter J. Meyers June 16, 2022 Aspirational Analysis: Competitive Research for New (or Small) Sites Competitive Research | Keyword Research Competitive SERP analysis is based on understanding the broader ecosystems of your ranking keywords. This is great if you’re an established business, but what if you’ve got a brand new site or are still developing your SEO strategy and aren’t ranking for many keywords? Dr. Pete walks you through a solution: aspirational analysis. Read this post By: Adriana Stein May 24, 2022 How to Use Product Synonyms to Build Use Case Awareness & Scale SEO Keyword Research | Search Engines By expanding the ways you talk about your product, you attract more users, which in turn scales your SEO strategy by giving you more relevant keywords to rank for. Let’s find out how using synonyms in your product-led SEO strategy can slingshot your growth forward. Read this post
